text: Hyoscyamus albus, the white henbane or yellow henbane, is a plant in the family of Solanaceae.Thomas Meyer: Weißes Bilsenkraut. Datenblatt mit Bestimmungsschlüssel.Ehrentraud Bayer, Karl-Peter Buttler, Xaver Finkenzeller, Jürke Grau: Pflanzen des Mittelmeerraums. Mosaik Verlag GmbH, München 1986. It is found in Southern Europe. ==References== Category:Solanoideae Category:Plants described in 1753 Category:Taxa named by Carl Linnaeus
title: Hyoscyamus albus
